description: The plant is healthy with no signs of disease
symptoms: Green leaves, normal growth, no spots or discoloration
prevention_steps: Maintain proper watering, ensure good drainage, use balanced fertilizers, monitor regularly for pests

description: Bacterial spot is caused by Xanthomonas bacteria and affects leaves, stems, and fruit
symptoms: Small dark brown spots on leaves, yellow halos around spots, fruit lesions, leaf drop
prevention_steps: Use disease-free seeds, avoid overhead watering, maintain plant spacing, remove infected plants, crop rotation

description: Early blight is a fungal disease caused by Alternaria solani
symptoms: Dark brown spots with concentric rings on older leaves, yellowing around spots, leaf drop, stem lesions
prevention_steps: Remove lower leaves, mulch around plants, avoid overhead irrigation, ensure good drainage, crop rotation, use fungicides like Mancozeb or Chlorothalonil

description: Late blight is a devastating disease caused by Phytophthora infestans
symptoms: Large brown blotches on leaves, white mold on leaf undersides, rapid plant death, fruit rot
prevention_steps: Plant resistant varieties, avoid overhead watering, ensure good drainage, remove infected plants immediately

description: Leaf mold is caused by the fungus Passalora fulva and thrives in humid conditions
symptoms: Yellow spots on upper leaf surface, olive-green to brown mold on undersides, leaf curling
prevention_steps: Improve air circulation, reduce humidity, avoid overhead watering, remove infected leaves

description: Septoria leaf spot is a fungal disease that affects tomato foliage
symptoms: Small circular spots with dark borders and gray centers, spots on lower leaves first, progressive defoliation
prevention_steps: Mulch plants, avoid wetting foliage, remove infected leaves, crop rotation, use fungicides preventively

description: Spider mites are tiny pests that suck plant juices
symptoms: Yellow stippling on leaves, fine webbing on plants, leaf bronzing, reduced plant vigor
prevention_steps: Maintain adequate moisture, spray water on undersides of leaves, introduce predatory mites, avoid over-fertilizing

description: Target spot is a fungal disease caused by Corynespora cassiicola
symptoms: Brown spots with concentric rings, spots on leaves and fruit, leaf yellowing and drop
prevention_steps: Improve air circulation, avoid overhead irrigation, remove plant debris, use resistant varieties

description: Viral disease transmitted by whiteflies causing severe yield loss
symptoms: Upward leaf curling, yellowing of leaf margins, stunted growth, reduced fruit production
prevention_steps: Control whitefly populations, use virus-resistant varieties, remove infected plants, use reflective mulches

description: Viral disease that causes mottled leaves and reduced yield
symptoms: Mottled light and dark green on leaves, leaf distortion, stunted growth, reduced fruit quality
prevention_steps: Use virus-free seeds, sanitize tools, control aphids, remove infected plants, avoid tobacco use near plants

description: The rice plant is healthy with no signs of disease
symptoms: Green leaves, normal tillering, no spots or discoloration
prevention_steps: Maintain proper water levels, use balanced fertilizers, monitor for pests, practice crop rotation

description: Brown spot is a fungal disease caused by Bipolaris oryzae
symptoms: Small circular brown spots on leaves, spots may have yellow halos, seedling blight in severe cases
prevention_steps: Use healthy seeds, maintain proper fertilization, ensure good drainage, avoid water stress

description: Bacterial leaf blight is caused by Xanthomonas oryzae
symptoms: Water-soaked streaks on leaves, yellow to white lesions, wilting of seedlings (Kresek phase)
prevention_steps: Use resistant varieties, avoid excessive nitrogen, maintain field sanitation, ensure proper water management

description: Leaf smut is a fungal disease caused by Entyloma oryzae
symptoms: Small, slightly raised black spots on leaves, spots may enlarge and rupture
prevention_steps: Use certified seeds, balanced fertilization, remove infected plant debris

description: The grape vine is healthy with no signs of disease
symptoms: Green leaves, vigorous growth, healthy fruit clusters
prevention_steps: Regular pruning, proper canopy management, balanced fertilization

description: Black rot is a fungal disease affecting grape leaves and fruit
symptoms: Brown circular spots on leaves with black borders, shriveled black berries (mummies)
prevention_steps: Remove mummified fruit, prune for air circulation, apply fungicides early in the season

description: ESCA (Black Measles) is a complex fungal trunk disease
symptoms: Tiger-stripe pattern on leaves, purple or black spots on fruit, dieback of arms or trunk
prevention_steps: Use certified vines, protect pruning wounds, remove infected wood

description: Leaf blight (Isariopsis Leaf Spot) affects grape foliage
symptoms: Irregular brown spots on leaves, premature defoliation, reduced vigor
prevention_steps: Fungicide application, remove fallen leaves, maintain good air circulation

description: The maize plant is healthy
symptoms: Green leaves, strong stalk, healthy cob development
prevention_steps: Appropriate spacing, weed control, nutrient management

description: Northern Corn Leaf Blight caused by Exserohilum turcicum
symptoms: Long, cigar-shaped grey-green lesions on leaves, can lead to significant yield loss
prevention_steps: Resistant hybrids, crop rotation, residue management, timely fungicide application

description: Common rust is a fungal disease favored by cool, moist conditions
symptoms: Small, oval, cinnamon-brown pustules on both leaf surfaces
prevention_steps: Resistant hybrids, early planting, fungicides if infection is severe

description: Gray leaf spot is a major fungal disease of maize
symptoms: Rectangular, gray to tan lesions bordered by leaf veins
prevention_steps: Resistant hybrids, rotation with non-host crops, tillage to reduce residue

description: The potato plant is healthy
symptoms: Green foliage, no lesions or wilting
prevention_steps: Certified seed potatoes, proper hilling, pest monitoring

description: Early blight caused by Alternaria solani
symptoms: Dark brown spots with concentric rings (target board effect), lower leaves affected first
prevention_steps: Crop rotation, balanced nitrogen, fungicide sprays, remove plant debris

description: Late blight caused by Phytophthora infestans (same as tomato)
symptoms: Water-soaked lesions, white mold on undersides, tuber rot
prevention_steps: Certified seed, destruction of cull piles, preventative fungicides, kill vines before harvest
